text:
- [Narrator] User generated
content is exploding

and businesses ranging
from gaming startups
to well-established media companies
are having trouble keeping up.
To catch and remove toxic content,
large teams of moderators are employed
but people are still affected
resulting in poor user experiences,
increased brand risk and liability.
Using AWS AI and ML services,
you can streamline workflows and reclaim

up to 95% of the time
spent manually moderating,
effectively lowering your costs.
You can detect unwanted content
across media types and sources

by implementing solutions that
automatically translate text,

transcribe audio, and
analyze images and videos

all without requiring
machine learning expertise.

Or you can customize a
variety of media solutions
to meet your specific needs.

Protect your users from
toxicity and fight bullying
by fostering more inclusive spaces
that encourage engagement.

Increase the value of
your online marketplace

by verifying that your seller's
listings and user reviews

are compliant and safe to
share within your community.

You can also improve
your moderation accuracy,

speed to market and meet
specific industry needs
by adding your own parameters,
integrating additional insights,
or implementing human verification.

Create safe digital spaces
while lowering your costs

with AWS content moderation
services and solutions.
